sense.def:
A fixture
je kos pohištva ali opreme, ki je pritrjen v notranjosti stavbe in ostane v njej, ko se odselimo.

Kadar je nekaj ali nekdo
a fixture in a particular place
, je vedno na določenem kraju.

seg.quote: Pool seems likely to become a fixture in working-class pubs.
We had to cancel a lot of fixtures.
Most athletic clubs produce their own fixture lists.
